recipe.title: Crab, Chile & Mint Crostini
ingredients: Fresno chile or red jalapeño, stemmed, seeded, and minced
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
Thinly sliced fresh mint, for garnish
instructions: Gently combine crabmeat in a bowl with aioli or mayonnaise, lime juice, finely chopped fresh mint, and Fresno chile or red jalape&nitldeo. Season with kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper.
Spoon about 1 tablespoon crab mixture onto each toast and garnish with thinly sliced fresh mint.
